item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+3New Women Space

Happy Indigenous People‚Äôs Day!!

To celebrate we‚Äôve compiled a list of 10 Indigenous-owned businesses to show some love for this powerful and important day.

All-...natural medicines, ceremonial elixirs, makeup, home decor, fashion, traditional and contemporary, coffee, and MORE, ALL by Indigenous folx!!

As always please keep the list growing by tagging your favorite BIPOC and/or Queer BIPOC businesses and companies that are helping maintain tradition and their communities while also moving them forward in 2020.

#supportinclusion #diversity
#newwomenspace #nationalindigenouspeoplesday #supportqueerbusiness
#supportbipocbusinesses #color #selfcare #fashion #jewelry #makeup #skincare #art #indigenous #queerindigenous #twospirit

item.title: How Sway?
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

How Sway?

Jessica Louise is feeling drained.

Are y‚Äôall making arrangements for people to get to the polls if they want to vote or is it mostly just logging in online and yelling, into the void, üó£VOTE!

Bc ...folks don‚Äôt have identification, are at risk for being turned away due to not knowing their rights at the poll, lack transportation, and don‚Äôt have schedules or resources that will accommodate participating in (early or otherwise) voting.

How are you filling the gap OUTSIDE OF these performative, shame-inducing posts to engage this process?

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Black Lives Matter 5280#CTA #Calltoaction Black afternoon fam and friends! Don't know about y'all, but we are still...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Black Lives Matter 5280

#CTA #Calltoaction Black afternoon fam and friends! Don't know about y'all, but we are still in our feelings about the lack of Black nominees for #ColoradoTeach...eroftheYear. From your shout outs we put together a list of 32 Black educators in Denver and Aurora that deserve all the props for their #Blackeducatorexcellence! We're excited to share that BLM5280 is pledging to honor their general dopeness with a $50 award to each nominee BUT if we can get 160 of y‚Äôall to give just $10 we can double that and send each educator $100! Send your contribution at the link below and be sure to label it ‚Äò#BlackEducatorsMatter‚Äô.

www.venmo.com/BLM5280

Like, share, and comment 'done!' so this post doesn't get buried! ‚úäüèø‚úäüèø‚úäüèø

item.title: "During his 48+ years of his imprisonment, Jalil has...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

"During his 48+ years of his imprisonment, Jalil has accomplished the following: Bachelor of Arts degree in Sociology, Bachelor of Science degree in Psychology, Certificate of Architectural Drafting, Certificate of Computer Literacy.

He has established many programs, such as the first Men‚Äôs Group for therapeutic training in the NY State prison system, an African/Black Studies program, a computer literacy class, a Sociology class and a poetry class. He has received two commend...ations for preventing prison riots. He has raised money for the children‚Äôs fund, was office manager of the computer lab and a teacher‚Äôs aide for GED classes.

Jalil is also the recipient of several certificates for rehabilitation programming, and is a published author, poet, educator and blogger.

As a human rights advocate, he had the first U.S. prisoners national petition heard and recorded by a Special Committee at the United Nations on U.S. prisons and the existence of U.S. political prisoners. He has litigated several civil rights complaints on behalf of prisoners. In 2000, Essence magazine featured an article on father-daughter relationships. The article, entitled ‚ÄúDaddy Says,‚Äù quoted Jalil stressing the importance of maintaining these relations even during incarceration."
-freejalil.com
#FREETHEMALL #DecarcerateNOW

item.title: ‚úäüèø‚úäüèø‚úäüèø
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚úäüèø‚úäüèø‚úäüèø

GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and Girls

Let today‚Äôs walk and lessons from #AnitaHill give you the courage that you need to say the hard things that need to be said. To whoever it needs to be said to. ...

Even if it‚Äôs not popular. Even if no one believes you. Your truth is your truth.

No more muted tongue. Let it be what it will be. No more pleading through pursed lips. Stand firm sisters.

We have for generations kept secrets, swallowed lies, tolerated the intolerable for fear of what would come should we simply speak.

Well, let the words come. Let them flow like the Jordan River. Spit fire with each syllable. Let the phrases burn down the walls that have caged you.

Be free. Be healed.

And then promise to never betray yourself with silence again. #BlackHistoryBootcamp

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
item.content:encoded:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
